title: 50 perches Land for sale in Wattala, hendala
details:
Bare land FOR IMMEDIATE SALE in Kospattedeniya Road ,Hendala, Wattala .

Land size 51 perches (Bare land)
Calm and good Peaceful environment.
#Clear deed# complete documentation provided.
12ft Concreted wide roads, Pipe born water, Electricity.
900m to Negombo road and 15 minutes to Colombo.
800 m to Lyceum via 1st lane & 1.2 km OKI International school.
1km to Kerawalapitiya Highway Exit

It’s a great investment with the new highway being build going from Kerawalapitiya towards Katunayake (Airport) and connecting to the Southern Highway.

Already there are lots residential home started to build house. Ideal for residential with decent neighborhood (Professional crowd )
Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a prestigious block of land in a prestigious location.

Per perch LKR.850,000/= for blocks.
Negotiable if whole block is bought.

Please call for more information.
Contact Mr Eranga
077-4782383 or 0115924202
LANDCO PVT LTD.

NO BROKERS PLEASE. ONLY FOR SERIOUS BUYERS.
